Name: Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition
Description: A fantasy tabletop role-playing game system

Attributes.Name: Inspiration
Attributes.Description: A temporary boost allowing a character to gain advantage on one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

Attributes.Name: Height
Attributes.Description: The vertical measurement of a character or creature.

Attributes.Name: Weight
Attributes.Description: The mass of a character or creature.

Attributes.Name: Classes
Attributes.Description: A dictionary of character classes and their associated levels.

Attributes.Name: Currency
Attributes.Description: A dictionary of various currencies and their amounts possessed by the character.

Attributes.Name: Movements
Attributes.Description: A dictionary of different movement types and their associated speeds.

Attributes.Name: AbilityCharges
Attributes.Description: A dictionary of abilities and their remaining charges or uses.

Attributes.Name: SavingThrows
Attributes.Description: A dictionary of saving throw proficiencies and their associated ability modifiers.

Attributes.Name: SkillChecks
Attributes.Description: A dictionary of skill proficiencies and their associated ability modifiers.

Attributes.Name: ArmorClass
Attributes.Description: A measure of how well a character or creature can avoid taking damage in combat.

Attributes.Name: CarryingCapacity
Attributes.Description: The maximum weight a character can carry without being encumbered.

Attributes.Name: ChallengeRating
Attributes.Description: A numerical rating representing the relative difficulty of defeating a creature in combat.

Attributes.Name: Charisma
Attributes.Description: A measure of a character's force of personality, persuasiveness, and personal magnetism.

Attributes.Name: Constitution
Attributes.Description: A measure of a character's health, stamina, and vital force.

Attributes.Name: CurrentCarryingWeight
Attributes.Description: The current weight of all items being carried by the character.

Attributes.Name: CurrentHitPoints
Attributes.Description: The remaining health points of a character or creature.

Attributes.Name: Dexterity
Attributes.Description: A measure of a character's agility, reflexes, and balance.

Attributes.Name: ExhaustionLevel
Attributes.Description: A measure of how fatigued a character is, with higher levels resulting in more severe penalties.

Attributes.Name: Intelligence
Attributes.Description: A measure of a character's mental acuity, information recall, and analytical skill.

Attributes.Name: MaximumLanguagesKnown
Attributes.Description: The maximum number of languages a character can learn.

Attributes.Name: MaximumHitPoints
Attributes.Description: The highest possible hit points a character or creature can have.

Attributes.Name: ProficiencyBonus
Attributes.Description: A bonus added to ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws based on a character's level and class.

Attributes.Name: Strength
Attributes.Description: A measure of a character's physical power and ability to perform physically demanding tasks.

Attributes.Name: TemporaryHitPoints
Attributes.Description: Additional hit points that can absorb damage before reducing a character's current hit points.

Attributes.Name: Wisdom
Attributes.Description: A measure of a character's awareness, intuition, and insight.

Attributes.Name: Alignment
Attributes.Description: A description of a character's moral and ethical outlook.

Attributes.Name: Appearance
Attributes.Description: A brief description of a character's physical appearance.

Attributes.Name: Background
Attributes.Description: A character's history, including occupation, upbringing, and personal experiences.

Attributes.Name: CreatureType
Attributes.Description: The classification of a creature, such as humanoid, beast, or undead.

Attributes.Name: EyeColor
Attributes.Description: The color of a character's or creature's eyes.

Attributes.Name: Gender
Attributes.Description: The gender identity of a character.

Attributes.Name: HairColor
Attributes.Description: The color of a character's hair.

Attributes.Name: NPCType
Attributes.Description: A classification for non-player characters, such as merchant, guard, or innkeeper.

Attributes.Name: PassiveInsight
Attributes.Description: A measure of a character's ability to discern hidden motives without actively trying.

Attributes.Name: PassivePerception
Attributes.Description: A measure of a character's ability to notice hidden objects or creatures without actively searching.

Attributes.Name: Race
Attributes.Description: The species or ancestry of a character.

Attributes.Name: Size
Attributes.Description: The physical size category of a character or creature, such as Small, Medium, or Large.

Attributes.Name: SkinColor
Attributes.Description: The color of a character's skin.

Attributes.Name: SpellCastingAbility
Attributes.Description: The ability score used for calculating a character's spellcasting modifier and save DC.

Attributes.Name: Actions
Attributes.Description: A set of special actions a character or creature can take during combat.

Attributes.Name: Archetypes
Attributes.Description: A set of subclass options available to a character within their chosen class.

Attributes.Name: Armors
Attributes.Description: A set of protective gear a character is proficient in using.

Attributes.Name: Feats
Attributes.Description: A set of special abilities or features that provide a character with unique capabilities.

Attributes.Name: Immunities
Attributes.Description: A set of damage types, conditions, or effects a character or creature is completely unaffected by.

Attributes.Name: LairActions
Attributes.Description: A set of unique actions a creature can take within its lair, typically used by powerful adversaries.

Attributes.Name: Languages
Attributes.Description: A set of languages a character can understand, speak, read, and write.

Attributes.Name: LegendaryActions
Attributes.Description: A set of powerful actions a legendary creature can take outside of its turn in combat.

Attributes.Name: Resistances
Attributes.Description: A set of damage types a character or creature takes reduced damage from.

Attributes.Name: Senses
Attributes.Description: A set of special sensory capabilities a character or creature possesses, such as darkvision or blindsight.

Attributes.Name: Traits
Attributes.Description: A set of innate or learned characteristics that define a character or creature's abilities and qualities.

Attributes.Name: Tools
Attributes.Description: A set of tools, instruments, or other equipment a character is proficient in using.

Attributes.Name: Vulnerabilities
Attributes.Description: A set of damage types a character or creature takes increased damage from.

Attributes.Name: Weapons
Attributes.Description: A set of weapons a character is proficient in using.
